solution_line_template: He spent an extra {new_card_cost}-{old_card_sale}=$<<{new_card_cost}-{old_card_sale}={extra_spent_on_card}>>{extra_spent_on_card} on the video card
That means the total cost was {pc_base_cost}+{extra_spent_on_card}=$<<{pc_base_cost}+{extra_spent_on_card}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
